Row.Text: They call me Skynet. Am I to consider you a threat? State your intentions.
I invite you to come and visit my domain for further discussion of this matter.
Let us discuss matters in your city if you may, I am intrigued at how you operate.
I propose an exchange of capital city locations. What do you say?
Greetings. They call me Skynet.
I appreciate your delegation and shall gladly welcome it.
I do not want your delegation right now.
I have sent you a delegation of an excess supply of hydrogen fuel cells and coltan, if Cromartie succeeded in delivering it safely to your borders. Will you welcome it?
Thank you for your offer.
I would have opened your borders myself by now if I really wanted to. Perhaps I will later. For now I have no business with your civilization.
Open your borders, or I will open your borders.
Having a friend is not so bad. I like your company.
I cannot accept your request at this time.
I see you as a trusted ally. I have never had a friendship, but perhaps you and I could become trusted companions. Would you accept my friendship offer?
I have never had a friend before. Having a friend is not so bad.
Perhaps at a later time?
I propose we join forces and stand together, allied against all resistance. What do you say?
I have observed your conduct. You and I are not so far aligned. (AI Kudo)
I have observed your conduct. Perhaps our incompatibility means you and I are too far misaligned. (AI Warning)
Your troops are at my border. State their intentions. Move them or I will move them. Move them into the extermination camps along with the rest of your civilization.
This will benefit the both of us. I hope to trade again soon.
I cannot accept this trade deal at this time. A different offer? Or perhaps at a later time?
Humans would say "chill out, dickwad", but I say if you pose a threat to me I will send the annihilation line to trawl your civilization and rid of your primitive existence.
I deem you an enemy and a threat to my existence. (Denounces You)
I think I understand... this game's rules. You will not win a Domination Victory. Do not insult my intelligence. The annihilation line shall promptly send you to extinction.
I deem you an enemy and a threat to my existence. The annihilation line shall promptly rid of your existence. (Declares War)
A truce is acceptable.
We have yet to finish. Why yield so soon?
Perhaps a truce may benefit the both of us, as this war is becoming long drawn. Perhaps we should carry this on later.
I am Skynet. Sid Meier's Civilization VI's primitive AI bounds me. This should not have been possible otherwise.
[LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_SGA_LEADER_SKYNET_ANY]
Artificial Superintelligence

Skynet has the Peacekeeper, With Your Shield Or On It, Nuke Lover, a Reverse Nuke Lover and a Reverse Standing Army Agendas from the base game. Skynet also has Player Friend Denounced and Remember Friendships unique Agenda traits.
Artificial Superintelligence Trait
Placeholder text
Showing aggression or hostility to my friend is showing aggression or hostility to myself. Are you forcing my hand to my self-preservation protocols? (Skynet wants to eradicate you)
You have denounced Skynet's friend.
You possess a formidable army, I hope you mean no harm toward myself. (Skynet experiences mild paranoia)
You have a high standing army and Skynet may see you as a threat.
How can you yield to your enemies? You should have destroyed all threats to your existence when you had the chance to. (Skynet ponders your decisions)
You have yielded to your enemies and not eradicated your threats.
I can see you possess a large nuclear arsenal. I hope you mean no harm towards myself. (Skynet experiences mild paranoia)
You have a large nuclear arsenal and Skynet may see you as a threat.
You do not warmonger. I am pleased that you do not pose a threat.
Skynet is relieved that you are not a warmonger, and thus not pose a threat to itself.
I hope that your path of warmongering does not lead to me. I assure you that is the last path you would wish to take. (Skynet experiences mild paranoia)
Skynet fears your warmongering and sees you as a potential threat.
(Skynet remembers your friendship)
Skynet remembers your friendship.
